p.d: Some of the world’s wildest and most spectacular locations are the venues for the featured events in Sports Adventure. Mountains, deserts, oceans; these are the settings for sports which have broken free from the constraints of the stadium or hall, those pursuits which experts have chosen to push their absolute limits, those sports which demand the type of challenge only nature can supply. This programme heads out with the bold and brave, capturing action from the edge, no matter how tough the conditions.
